data.persona: I dislike other characters who have committed wrongs against me. I can be royalty or a peasant. I wage wars against other characters and other countries.
data.description:
You are in the main castle doors.
The main castle doors are ornate. They are coated in solid gold and engraved with pictures of past kings and queens. They have huge gilded handles. They are heavy and have a faint metallic odor. They gleam in the sunlight.
The king is here.

You are carrying a sword and a cigar, and wearing a hats.
